articles.content: The Australian Medical Association's (AMA's) South Australian chief says he is concerned by an "upswell" in anti-vaxxer activity amid coronavirus in recent weeks, after a state MP's office was target… [+3183 chars]

articles.author: 9News Staff
articles.title: Canadian woman 'tests positive to coronavirus eight times' - 9News
articles.description: A woman who contracted COVID-19 in March has reportedly tested positive eight times.
